#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A furry, mouse-like tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. Just when it seems to be done, the tip of [npc.her] tails sprouts into a lightning bolt pattern with a #IF(npc.targetedBody.isFeminine()) flattened#ELSE pointed#ENDIF end. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] complete control over [npc.her] new appendage.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a Raichu tail, [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] furry Raichu tails sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're each about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] complete control over [npc.her] new appendages.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] Raichu tails, [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] Raichu tail, which [npc.she] can completely control at will. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] Raichu tails, which [npc.she] can completely control at will. #ENDIF
